memberdef.name: GXV_UNITSIZE_VALIDATE
memberdef.initializer:
FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( UNITSIZE != CORRECTSIZE ) \ { \ FT_ERROR(( "unitSize=%d differs from" \ " expected unitSize=%d" \ " in LookupTable %s
", \ UNITSIZE, CORRECTSIZE, FORMAT )); \ if ( UNITSIZE != 0 && NUNITS != 0 ) \ { \ FT_ERROR(( " cannot validate anymore
" )); \ FT_INVALID_FORMAT; \ } \ else \ FT_ERROR(( " forcibly continues
" )); \ } \ FT_END_STMNT
